snippet: Pedro Espada Jr. pleaded guilty to one count of tax evasion in federal court in Brooklyn on Friday, ending a lengthy criminal battle.
abstract: Pedro Espada Jr, former Democratic state senator from the Bronx, pleads guilty to one count of tax evasion; in return for dismissal of all remaining charges, Espada agrees not to appeal an earlier conviction for stealing from Soundview Health Center, nonprofit organization he founded in his borough.
lead_paragraph: Pedro Espada Jr. pleaded guilty to one count of tax evasion in federal court in Brooklyn on Friday, ending a lengthy criminal battle.

headline.seo: Pedro Espada Jr. Pleads Guilty to Tax Evasion
headline.main: Espada Speaks Softly as He Pleads Guilty to a Single Tax Charge
headline.print_headline: Espada Speaks Softly as He Pleads Guilty to a Single Tax Charge
